

I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '2';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_firstname, customers_lastname
                         from customers
                         where customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                              from whos_online
                              where session_id = '8eupfald5ep4l7p0g949stdej2' and ip_address='127.0.0.1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select *
        from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter, session_counter from counter_history where startdate='20121206';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM counter_history WHERE startdate = '20121206' AND counter = 1 AND session_counter = 1 LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter from counter;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT customers_id, customers_authorization from customers WHERE customers_id=1;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select product_is_always_free_shipping as check_it from products where products_id='3' limit 1;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_price, products_tax_class_id, products_weight,
                          products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_always_free_shipping, products_discount_type, products_discount_type_from,
                          products_virtual, products_model
                          from products
                          where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '3' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_new_products_price from specials where products_id = '3' and status='1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select master_categories_id from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select product_is_free from products where products_id = '3' limit 1;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_price, products_tax_class_id, products_weight,
                          products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_always_free_shipping, products_discount_type, products_discount_type_from,
                          products_virtual, products_model
                          from products
                          where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

                          products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_always_free_shipping, products_discount_type, products_discount_type_from,
                          products_virtual, products_model
                          from products
                          where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');

I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_virtual, products_model, products_price, product_is_always_free_shipping from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.customers_firstname, c.customers_lastname, c.customers_telephone,
                                    c.customers_email_address, ab.entry_company, ab.entry_street_address,
                                    ab.entry_suburb, ab.entry_postcode, ab.entry_city, ab.entry_zone_id,
                                    z.zone_name, co.countries_id, co.countries_name,
                                    co.countries_iso_code_2, co.countries_iso_code_3,
                                    co.address_format_id, ab.entry_state
                                   from (customers c, address_book ab )
                                   left join zones z on (ab.entry_zone_id = z.zone_id)
                                   left join countries co on (ab.entry_country_id = co.countries_id)
                                   where c.customers_id = '1'
                                   and ab.customers_id = '1'
                                   and c.customers_default_address_id = ab.address_book_id;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select ab.entry_firstname, ab.entry_lastname, ab.entry_company,
                                    ab.entry_street_address, ab.entry_suburb, ab.entry_postcode,
                                    ab.entry_city, ab.entry_zone_id, z.zone_name, ab.entry_country_id,
                                    c.countries_id, c.countries_name, c.countries_iso_code_2,
                                    c.countries_iso_code_3, c.address_format_id, ab.entry_state
                                   from address_book ab
                                   left join zones z on (ab.entry_zone_id = z.zone_id)
                                   left join countries c on (ab.entry_country_id = c.countries_id)
                                   where ab.customers_id = '1'
                                   and ab.address_book_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select ab.entry_firstname, ab.entry_lastname, ab.entry_company,
                                   ab.entry_street_address, ab.entry_suburb, ab.entry_postcode,
                                   ab.entry_city, ab.entry_zone_id, z.zone_name, ab.entry_country_id,
                                   c.countries_id, c.countries_name, c.countries_iso_code_2,
                                   c.countries_iso_code_3, c.address_format_id, ab.entry_state
                                  from address_book ab
                                  left join zones z on (ab.entry_zone_id = z.zone_id)
                                  left join countries c on (ab.entry_country_id = c.countries_id)
                                  where ab.customers_id = '1'
                                  and ab.address_book_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select ab.entry_country_id, ab.entry_zone_id
                              from address_book ab
                              left join zones z on (ab.entry_zone_id = z.zone_id)
                              where ab.customers_id = '1'
                              and ab.address_book_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, p.master_categories_id, p.products_status, pd.products_name, p.products_model, p.products_image,
                                  p.products_price, p.products_weight, p.products_tax_class_id,
                                  p.products_quantity_order_min, p.products_quantity_order_units, p.products_quantity_order_max,
                                  p.product_is_free, p.products_priced_by_attribute,
                                  p.products_discount_type, p.products_discount_type_from
                           from products p, products_description pd
                           where p.products_id = '3'
                           and pd.products_id = p.products_id
                           and pd.language_id = '2';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select product_is_free from products where products_id = '3' limit 1;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_quantity_order_units from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select tax_description, tax_rate, tax_priority
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  order by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select tax_description
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  order by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select amount from coupon_gv_customer where customer_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, p.master_categories_id, p.products_status, pd.products_name, p.products_model, p.products_image,
                                  p.products_price, p.products_weight, p.products_tax_class_id,
                                  p.products_quantity_order_min, p.products_quantity_order_units, p.products_quantity_order_max,
                                  p.product_is_free, p.products_priced_by_attribute,
                                  p.products_discount_type, p.products_discount_type_from
                           from products p, products_description pd
                           where p.products_id = '3'
                           and pd.products_id = p.products_id
                           and pd.language_id = '2';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain

                      WHERE coupon_id = '0'
                      ORDER BY coupon_restrict ASC;

                      WHERE products_id = '3';

select customers_group_pricing from customers where customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, p.master_categories_id, p.products_status, pd.products_name, p.products_model, p.products_image,
                                  p.products_price, p.products_weight, p.products_tax_class_id,
                                  p.products_quantity_order_min, p.products_quantity_order_units, p.products_quantity_order_max,
                                  p.product_is_free, p.products_priced_by_attribute,
                                  p.products_discount_type, p.products_discount_type_from
                           from products p, products_description pd
                           where p.products_id = '3'
                           and pd.products_id = p.products_id
                           and pd.language_id = '2';

SELECT products_model FROM products
                      WHERE products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_group_pricing from customers where customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_quantity, pad.products_attributes_filename, p.product_is_always_free_shipping
                              from products p
                              left join products_attributes pa
                               on p.products_id=pa.products_id
                              left join products_attributes_download pad
                               on pa.products_attributes_id=pad.products_attributes_id
                              WHERE p.products_id = '3';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select entry_firstname as firstname, entry_lastname as lastname,
                             entry_company as company, entry_street_address as street_address,
                             entry_suburb as suburb, entry_city as city, entry_postcode as postcode,
                             entry_state as state, entry_zone_id as zone_id,
                             entry_country_id as country_id
                      from address_book
                      where customers_id = '1'
                      and address_book_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format_id as format_id
                             from countries
                             where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format as format
                             from address_format
                             where address_format_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select countries_name
                      from countries
                      where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select zone_code
                   from zones
                   where zone_country_id = '44'
                   and zone_id = '0';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select entry_firstname as firstname, entry_lastname as lastname,
                             entry_company as company, entry_street_address as street_address,
                             entry_suburb as suburb, entry_city as city, entry_postcode as postcode,
                             entry_state as state, entry_zone_id as zone_id,
                             entry_country_id as country_id
                      from address_book
                      where customers_id = '1'
                      and address_book_id = '1';

I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select entry_firstname as firstname, entry_lastname as lastname,
                             entry_company as company, entry_street_address as street_address,
                             entry_suburb as suburb, entry_city as city, entry_postcode as postcode,
                             entry_state as state, entry_zone_id as zone_id,
                             entry_country_id as country_id
                      from address_book
                      where customers_id = '1'
                      and address_book_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format_id as format_id
                             from countries
                             where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format as format
                             from address_format
                             where address_format_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select countries_name
                      from countries
                      where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select zone_code
                   from zones
                   where zone_country_id = '44'
                   and zone_id = '0';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select entry_firstname as firstname, entry_lastname as lastname,
                             entry_company as company, entry_street_address as street_address,
                             entry_suburb as suburb, entry_city as city, entry_postcode as postcode,
                             entry_state as state, entry_zone_id as zone_id,
                             entry_country_id as country_id
                      from address_book
                      where customers_id = '1'
                      and address_book_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format_id as format_id
                             from countries
                             where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select address_format as format
                             from address_format
                             where address_format_id = '1';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select countries_name
                      from countries
                      where countries_id = '44';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select zone_code
                   from zones
                   where zone_country_id = '44'
                   and zone_id = '0';



I AM HERE checkout_process
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_email_format from customers where customers_email_address= 'test@test.com';
